source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SEQ_00<tab>The wounded Resistance fighter has a lot on his mind.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SEQ_00<tab>野戦病院のアラミゴ解放軍の負傷兵は、虚ろな目で冒険者を見つめている。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the bloody bandana to the Resistance fighter's mother in Ala Gannha.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_TODO_00<tab>アラガーナの息子を待つ母親に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C9E01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_000<tab>There is something I would ask of you, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_000<tab>なあ、アンタ。
俺の話を聞いてくれないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_001<tab>I joined the Resistance against my mother's wishes. She awaits me back in my hometown.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_001<tab>俺には、故郷に残してきた母親がいるんだ。
アラミゴ奪還を夢見て、反対を押し切って家を飛び出し、
解放軍に志願したんだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_002<tab>I'm lucky to still be here after that last battle and I don't want to take her love for granted anymore.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_002<tab>先の帝国軍の襲撃で、やられちまって見てのとおりの有様さ。
生死を彷徨って、どうにかこの世に留まることができて、
ようやく母親の忠告の意味がわかってな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_003<tab>Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_003<tab>よければ、俺の代わりに、この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C9E01 /var>」を、
アラガーナにいる母親に渡してきてくれないだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_004<tab>And tell her that I said “Thank you.” I want her to know I understand why she objected to me joining the fight against the Empire.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_004<tab>そして一言、ありがとうと伝えてほしい。
喧嘩別れしたままにしておきたくないんだ……。
頼んだぜ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_005<tab>Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf. And tell her of my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_005<tab>この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C9E01 /var>」を、
アラガーナにいる母親に渡してきてくれないだろうか？
そして一言、ありがとうと伝えてほしい。
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_010<tab>何でしょう、私に何かご用でも？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_011<tab>Wh-Why, this is my boy's! Has something happened to him!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_011<tab>これは……私が息子の誕生日に贈ったバンダナ……！？
これを届けに来たということは、息子は……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_012<tab>Thank heavens. He is still safe. I tried to dissuade him from joining the Resistance, but he would not listen. We had a big fight and he wound up sneaking out in the dead of night.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_012<tab>よ、よかった……生きてはいるのね！？
危険だからと、何度も止めようとしたのだけれど、
あの子は言うことを聞かず、喧嘩別れになってしまって……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_013<tab>It is a weight off my mind to learn that he does not resent me. However, the fact he has returned this bandana must mean he intends to continue fighting.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_013<tab>そんな息子が「ありがとう」だなんてねぇ……。
でも、このバンダナを返したということは、息子はきっと、
まだ戦い続けるつもりなのでしょう？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_014<tab>If his resolve is truly that strong then there is little chance of me convincing him to come home. I will continue to pray for his safe return.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_014<tab>生死を彷徨ってなお、
戦い続けるほど決意が固いのなら、もう止められない……。
だから、祈り続けて無事の帰還を待つことにするわ。
